p: Sterols are triterpenes Structurally sterols are based on cyclopentaneperhydroxyphenanthrene (sterane) ring system. They are also recognized as phytosterols, Liebermann's Burchard test is used for revealing the presence of phytosterols in extract. Small quantity of extract was mixed with 1 ml of acetic anhydride and 2 ml CHCl 3 followed by gradual addition of concentrated H 2SO 4 through the side of the test tube. Development of a ring of brown colour at junction of two layers is the indication of the presence of sterols.
